description: This file defines API view functions for a question-answering system. It includes health check and question-answer endpoints, utilizing serializers and a backend service for query processing. The code leverages Django REST Framework and drf_yasg for Swagger documentation.

classes.name: AskRequestSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for validating incoming question ask requests.

classes.name: AskResponseSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for formatting response payloads for question answers.

methods.name: health(request)
methods.description: API endpoint to perform health check, returning server status message.

methods.name: ask(request)
methods.description: API endpoint to accept a natural language question, process it through the qa_service, and return answer data.
